name: Procter & Gamble Co.
description: Procter & Gamble Co. (P&G) is a global leader in consumer goods, renowned for its wide range of trusted brands in various categories, including beauty, grooming, health care, fabric care, home care, and baby, feminine, and family care. Established in 1837 by William Procter and James Gamble, the company has built a legacy of innovation and excellence in product development. P&G's portfolio includes iconic brands such as Tide, Pampers, Gillette, Head & Shoulders, and Crest, which have become household names around the world. The company is committed to sustainability and social responsibility, aiming to reduce its environmental footprint through initiatives focused on water conservation, waste reduction, and the use of renewable energy. P&G invests heavily in research and development to continuously improve its offerings and meet the evolving needs of consumers. With a presence in over 180 countries, Procter & Gamble not only focuses on financial performance but also emphasizes community engagement and improving lives through its products and programs. The company’s mission is to provide branded products of superior quality that improve the lives of consumers, contributing to a better world.

seo.meta_title: Procter & Gamble Co. | Leading Consumer Goods Company
seo.meta_description: Learn about Procter & Gamble Co., a leading consumer goods company known for its trusted brands in beauty, grooming, health care, and more. Discover P&G's commitment to sustainability and innovation.

faq.question: What is Procter & Gamble known for?
faq.answer: P&G is known for its wide range of consumer goods, including brands in beauty, grooming, health care, and home care.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Procter & Gamble?
faq.answer: Jon Moeller is the CEO of Procter & Gamble Co.

faq.question: Where is Procter & Gamble headquartered?
faq.answer: P&G is headquartered in Cincinnati, Ohio, USA.

faq.question: What are some of P&G's main brands?
faq.answer: Some of P&G's main brands include Tide, Pampers, Gillette, Olay, and Crest.
